txt.en: <rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Tharb has fallen to your mighty blow.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Zímarp has fallen to your mighty blow.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Krampum falls to your mighty blow.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Pugh has been defeated.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Fríb, the boggart, falls to your mighty blow.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Kaushar has been defeated, crushing his attempt to retake the hill.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Tharb has arrived to re-take the eastern gates.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Zímarp has arrived to re-take the western gates.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Krampum has arrived to re-take the western flank.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Pugh has arrived on the eastern flank to reinforce the courtyard.</rgb>
A goblin scout is trying to escape with word of Esteldín's location.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: An angry shout is heard in the courtyard below.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The sound of a mighty roar is heard from the courtyard below.</rgb>
'The Rangers of Esteldín will remember your service, [placeholder]. Without your aid, Esteldín would surely have fallen.'
<rgb=#00FF00>Secured the main gate</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Secured the western gate</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Secured the eastern gate</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Secured the central gate</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Secured the entrance of Graug's encampment</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>You have secured the area after destroying the Catapults. Now you can seek out and defeat Graug and his goblin-scouts.</rgb>
Destroyed catapults ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Late in the night, a party of goblin-scouts discovered the location of the Ranger-refuge known as Esteldín. The goblins have fled to Dol Dínen, where you must dispatch them before they can bring reinforcements.
<rgb=#00FF00>Defeated Graug and secured the knowledge of Esteldín's location</rgb>
You allowed a goblin-scout to escape with the knowledge of the location of Estledín
'Rain fire down upon these feeble weaklings.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The central gate is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
'The Rangers of the North will fall to the Iron Crown! Come forward flames... burn any of those who would attempt to escape.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The entrance to Graug's tent is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
Secure the main gate
With both outside gates secured, fewer reinforcements will be able to counter the daring attack on Dol Dinen.
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the central gate</rgb>
Secure the western gate
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the entrance of Graug's tent</rgb>
A goblin scout was narrowly intercepted by the Rangers that followed behind you. With the battle raging, no other Goblins can escape or all will be lost.
Secure the eastern gate
Secure the central gate
Secure the entrance of Graug's encampment
Secure the area.
Destroy catapults ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Graug and secure the knowledge of Esteldín's location
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow a goblin-scout to escape.</rgb>
Breach and secure the main gate of Dol Dínen.
Following a shrill cry from the ridge, stones begin to rain down on the courtyard.
Main Gate
Breach either the western or eastern gate of Dol Dínen.
Western Gate
With a path cleared through one of the gates, the central gate now bars your way from reaching the goblin-scouts.
Eastern Gate
Secure the entrance of the Graug's encampment at the top of the hill looking down upon the central gate.
Central Gate
Entrance to Graug's Encampment
Seek out and destroy the catapults that lie outside Graug's tent. This will allow the Rangers below to secure the camp below.
Catapults
The courtyard has fallen. Now all that remains is to defeat Graug and destroy any remnants of the information that he has gathered.
Graug's Encampment
Attack at Dawn
